Synonyms.Synonym: Percutaneous indirect laryngoscopy-guided botulinum toxin Treatment

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Botulinum toxin injection - larynx
QAPair.Answer: Botulinum toxin (BTX) is a type of nerve blocker. When injected, BTX blocks nerve signals to muscles so they relax. BTX is the toxin that causes botulism, a rare but serious illness. It is safe when used in very small doses.
